title: News24.com | Presidential Coordinating Council meets to outline progress and challenges on regulations of the National Lockdown
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa convened the first virtual meeting of the Presidential Coordinating Council (PCC) on Saturday.
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa convened the first virtual meeting of the Presidential Coordinating Council (PCC) on Saturday.
